<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81509</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4340</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Marketing Factsheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa sobre Marketing</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Fírice faoi Mhargaíocht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marketing-Checkliste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données de Vente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet Do Marketing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda Di Vendita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμπορικό ενημερωτικό δελτίο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Definition of marketing which outlinines the differences between marketing and selling.  The role of market research in identifying consumer demand is also dealt with.  </string>
            <string language="es">Definición de marketing que describe las diferencias entre el marketing y la venta. También se trata el papel de la investigación de mercado en la identificación de la demanda del consumidor.  </string>
            <string language="ga">Sainmhíniú faoi mhargaíocht a imlíníonn na difríochtaí idir margaíocht agus díol. Pléitear ról an taighde margaíochta in éileamh tomhaltóra a aithint chomh maith.  </string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios empresariales. Distribución</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">MarketingDistribution</string>
            <string language="es">Marketing. Notas</string>
            <string language="ga">Dáileadh Margaíochta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Notes</string>
            <string language="ga">Nótaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Definition des Marketings die outlinines die 
Unterschiede zwischen Marketing und dem Verkaufen. Die Rolle der
Marktforschung, wenn man Verbrauchernachfrage kennzeichnet, wird auch 
behandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Définition de marketing qui outlinines les 
différences entre le marketing et la vente. Le rôle de la 
recherche de marché en identifiant la demande du consommateur est 
également traité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Definição do marketing que outlinines as 
diferenças entre o marketing e vender. O papel da pesquisa de 
mercado em identificar a demanda de consumidor é tratado também de.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Definizione dell'introduzione sul mercato che 
outlinines le differenze fra l'introduzione sul mercato e vendere. 
Il ruolo di ricerca di mercato nell'identificare la domanda di 
beni di consumo egualmente si occupa di.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός του οποίου μάρκετινγκ outlinines οι 
διαφορές μεταξύ του μάρκετινγκ και της πώλησης. Ο ρόλος της
έρευνας αγοράς στον προσδιορισμό της καταναλωτικής ζήτησης 
εξετάζεται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">MarketingDistribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">MarketingDistribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Do Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">MarketingDistribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Di Affari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">MarketingDistribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακές μελέτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">MarketingDistribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
